entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EmitCompilerGeneratedFiles fails if the files are un-parsable #63711
    17.4
  • Cache FileIdentifier on CSharpSyntaxTree #63706
  • FAR doesn't build the code correctly when there are multiple "nested" classifications #63702
  • Holding CTRL does not always produce navigatable targets #63694
    17.4
  • CTRL+Click does not navigate in Decompiled document #63693
    17.4
  • Emit [module: RefSafetyRules] attribute for all modules compiled with updated escape rules #63692
    17.4
  • Remove special case in PEModuleSymbol.UseUpdatedEscapeRules for module referencing System.Runtime 7.0 #63691
  • Stack overflow in roslyn while compiling `System.Private.CoreLib` in `dotnet/runtime` #63689

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-32831.189 #63704
  • RemoteSymbolFinderService gold bars with missing required document #63682
    17.4

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix numbering conflict in enum due to merge #63710
    Area-Compilers
  • Prioritize results from the current document if all other things are equal in a nav-to result #63709
    Area-IDE
  • Fail when brace matcher finds no matching spans #63708
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Update the DartLab Template branch to main #63707
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use IsKeyboardFocusWithin instead of FocusLost #63705
    Area-IDE
  • Unify implementation of 'go to defintion' and 'go to definition on hover' #63703
    Area-IDE
  • Some improvements to Workspace.CanApplyChanges #63701
    Area-IDE
  • Do not remove a VBImport if it would cause an ambiguity issue. #63700
    Area-IDE
  • WIP #63698
    Area-Compilers
  • <experiment> #63695
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #63688
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63699
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Re-introduce main-vs-deps #63680
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63697
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63696
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63687
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Ensure we look for source-generated documents when making an OOP call #63683
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #63686
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update 17 3 packages #63599
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • First Draft of Common Language Server Protocol Framework (CLaSP) #62924
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • File types EE support #62812
    Area-Compilers
  • Refactoring constructor initializers to use primary constructors #63648
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Method group defaults #63673
    Area-Compilers
  • Provide way to dynamically create builtin-operator symbols off of a compilation #63408
    Area-IDE
  • Use net7.0 in source-build #62916
    Area-Infrastructure, Source-Build
  • Semantic snippets - foreach snippet #63058
    Area-IDE
  • Upgrade System.Memory to fully fix another MSBuild loading issue #63545
    Area-IDE
  • Build only test projects and split out building TFMs into separate queues #63677
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Deprecate usage of Workspace in TextLoader (breaking change) #63616
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Support RefSafetyRulesAttribute for interop with existing assemblies #63461
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Editorconfig diagnostics #63580
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Filter only valid symbols for inheritance completions #62013
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add feature to recommend making a struct 'readonly' when all its fields are already readonly. #63668
    Area-IDE
  • Report an error for an unsupported type tests involving 'ref' structs. #63646
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix race condition in analyzer driver for computing nodes to analyze … #63665
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Support changing return types of methods, properties, events #63486
    Area-Interactive
  • Fix completion service for providers with text view roles #63685
    Area-IDE
  • Produce warning on duplicate analyzer references #63264
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Don't include syntax tree's contents when throwing NFWs #63653
    Area-Compilers
